How can I get past this?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 4 Archive (PS2): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here) : How can I get past this?
By Sturnum94 on Wednesday, June 21, 2006 - 06:44 pm:

Okay, here is the deal. I had my monster, Soluv (Antlan-Joker) beat the B-level official match. Now I'm an A-rank breeder. So I've been waiting to see what I have to do next. A year later-nothin' happens. 6 more months-nothin'. I'm starting to think I'm stuck. 5 more months-nothin'. Now I'm starting to get mad. I've looked through walkthroughs and It says I need to go to the jungle to the 6th floor. Did that-nothin' on the 6th or 7th floors. What do I DO?!?!

By MrGG on Thursday, June 22, 2006 - 09:10 am:

How far have you gone in adventure mode? I think that plays a part, but I haven't played for a year.

By Sturnum94 on Friday, June 23, 2006 - 09:04 am:

I have beat the mocchi story line. The walkthrough said I had to fight Geras again on the sixth floor.

By Eagle Fierce on Friday, June 23, 2006 - 12:26 pm:

Have you checked or been granted access to some stone ruins, yet? I seem to remember some point around there, there's a fresco in that dungeon that speaks to the girl and almost knocks her out.

By Sturnum94 on Friday, June 23, 2006 - 03:49 pm:

Do you mean when Rio touches the Gaia stone in the jungle?

By Eagle Fierce on Friday, June 23, 2006 - 04:33 pm:

It's been a while since I've done it, but I remember an area of ruins with stone columns, this painting talking to Rio, and her nearly fainting and calling it forces you to head back at that point. The bottom line is that if you're stuck, searching the Dungeons of the game is the advised path. If that doesn't work, occasionally talking to someone at the prep school might help.

By Sturnum94 on Saturday, June 24, 2006 - 08:26 am:

okay, I'll check that out. But if I have more questions I'llcome back here.

By Sturnum94 on Saturday, June 24, 2006 - 04:09 pm:

Need help. Nothing is happening. What to do?

By Eagle Fierce on Sunday, June 25, 2006 - 11:34 am:

Well, the only other advice I can give if you've searched all the dungeons and talked to everyone in the towns is that there are a few points where you have to beat the tourney matches to move on. Have you gotten the true story of how you got kicked-out of the academy? I know once you beat the A Class tourney, you open up more storyline, but I was thinking there was a lot more before that. I'd like to help more, but I can't remember everything I did every week XD I may have to just start this game over again, myself.

By Infernus on Sunday, June 25, 2006 - 12:23 pm:

If you've completed the Mocchi storyline as you say, and can unlock Mocchis, this is my recommendation:

Beat the A class official tournament.

I don't want to spoil anything, but I have a hunch that it may just help you out.

If you don't mind spoilers, I'd be happy to explain. To be brief, though, just as Eagle says, it opens up more storyline.

By Sturnum94 on Sunday, June 25, 2006 - 01:36 pm:

I don't know if this might help you help me, but at one point, a lady came to give me some fan mail, but it was just mail against Rio. One letter said Rio was worthless. Would that be of use? Is that a good sign?

By Salokin on Friday, September 1, 2006 - 12:25 pm:

If you have got past Geres read this, if not go down until you see the skiped line.
Go to floor 6 and search all the empty rooms.

If you've beat him and Deihl go to Vizley and then go to Elives School.
